testcase.name: Validate eLearning Signup
testcase.system-out: Given User has access to eLearning HomePage.................................passed When User navigates to the eLearning HomePage...............................passed And User Clicks on Signup button............................................passed Then Registration page is displayed.........................................passed When user fills in all mandatory values "Fname24","Lname24","email24@email.com","Usname24","acbdqwer1234","acbdqwer1234".passed And User clicks on Register button..........................................passed Then User Registration should be successful and should display Welcome Message with "Fname24".passed When User clicks on homepage................................................passed And Clicks on Compose.......................................................passed And enters receipient address, subject and message "vir", "Test Mail", "Hello World!!".passed And Clicks on Send Message button...........................................passed Then Mail is sent successfully and a Confirmation of mail sent to "vir" is displayed.passed
